title: Crucial Conversations Audio Companion on 6 CDs Set 2005
description:
When it comes to your personal or professional life, what could be more important than powering up your ability to talk about what is truly important? This six-CD set picks up where the bestselling book Crucial Conversations: Tools for Talking When Stakes are High left off. Enjoy engaging and often entertaining follow-up to the skills firs introduced in Crucial Conversations and now available as award-winning training course for corporate classroom everywhere.

Full of humorous stories, creative insights, and useful tips for better handling the high-stakes situations that keep many individuals, teams, and organizations stuck, the Audio CD Companion will help you achieve the results you are after. Continue your exploration today with topics such as:

Disc 1: What Dialogue Is and Why Itâ€™s Important * How to Stay Focused on What You Really Want

Disc 2: How to Notice When Safety Is at Risk

Disc 3: How to Make It Safe to Talk about Almost Anything

Disc 4: How to Stay in Dialogue When Youâ€™re Angry, Scared, or Hurt

Disc 5: How to Speak Persuasively, Not Abrasively * How to Listen When Others Blow Up or Clam Up

Disc 6: How to Turn Crucial Conversations into Actions and Results * Peers, At Home and Bosses
